concept.title: echo
concept.shortdesc: Echo the given text, which may include system and user variables.

conbody.p: The command can also echo gfsh environment properties (using 'set variable' command) if variable name is pre-pended with '$' - like UNIX.
See for a list of gfsh environment variables.

row.entry: String to be echoed. For example, SYS_USER variable is set to ${SYS_USER}.

p.codeblock: gfsh>echo --string=$* Property | Value ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- APP_FETCH_SIZE | 1000 APP_LAST_EXIT_STATUS | 0 APP_LOG_FILE | /home/stymon/gfsh-2013-03-04_12-13-44.log APP_NAME | gfsh APP_PWD | /home/stymon APP_QUERY_RESULTS_DISPLAY_MODE | table APP_QUIET_EXECUTION | false SYS_CLASSPATH | /home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/gemfire.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/antlr.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/gfsh-dependencies.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/pulse-dependencies.jar:.:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/gemfire.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/antlr.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/gfSecurityImpl.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/jackson-core-asl-1.9.9.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/commons-logging.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/tomcat-embed-core.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/tomcat-embed-logging-juli.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/lib/tomcat-embed-jasper.jar:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/SampleCode/tutorial/classes:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/SampleCode/helloworld/classes:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/SampleCode/quickstart/classes:/home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169/SampleCode/examples/dist/classes:/usr/java/jdk1.8.0_60/jre/../lib/tools.jar SYS_GEMFIRE_DIR | /home/stymon/Pivotal_GemFire_701_b40169 SYS_HOST_NAME | stymon SYS_JAVA_VERSION | 1.8.0_60 SYS_OS | Linux SYS_OS_LINE_SEPERATOR | SYS_USER | stymon SYS_USER_HOME | /home/stymon
